Library Assault

Unleash your inner bookworm and become the ultimate library defender in this thrilling 3D FPS game

Features

Unleash your FPS skills with Library Assault.

Multiple maps

Explore different maps and conquer new challenges with each level. Our library offers a range of environments for you to explore and defend.

Different enemy types

Face off against a variety of enemies with unique appearances and abilities. Our library is crawling with different enemies for you to battle.

Great sound effects

Immerse yourself in the action with our stunning sound effects. Every sound is designed to draw you deeper into the heart-pounding action.

About

Welcome to Library Assault, a 3D FPS game where you must fight your way through a library overrun with enemy forces. As the sole defender of the library, you'll face a range of challenges as you battle through multiple maps filled with different enemy types. Use your skills and weapons to eliminate your foes and defend the library at all costs. Library Assault was developed with passion and dedication by a solo developer who is passionate about 3D FPS games. Every aspect of the game, from the graphics to the gameplay mechanics, was carefully crafted by one person to create an immersive and exciting experience for players. With stunning sound effects and multiple maps to explore, Library Assault offers an unforgettable gaming experience that will keep you coming back for more. Are you ready to take on the challenge and defend the library?

In Progress

The Action Never Stops: What's Coming Next to Library Assault

Mobile Mode

Take the action on the go with Library Assault's new mobile mode. Play anywhere, anytime and experience the same excitement and challenges as the desktop version. Stay tuned for the official release!

More Maps

Get ready for even more library chaos with Library Assault's new map expansion. Explore new areas, face new challenges, and uncover hidden secrets. Coming soon!

More Challenging Enemies

Think you've got what it takes? Prepare for the ultimate test with Library Assault's new challenging enemies. Each one more deadly than the last, requiring skill and strategy to take down. Stay tuned for their arrival!
